3.1 200411170800

I've downloaded the RCP SDK and configured via the PDE preference page to use
the RCP target for my workspace. This works fine and all plug-ins are rebuilt.
This is good, but I can't launch any of my RCP applications. The following error
is in my log. If a change back the target, I can launch again.

Error 2004-11-20 16:15:19.155 An internal error occurred during: "Launching".
java.lang.NullPointerException
